key_risks: High financial leverage and debt levels
Volatility and underperformance of key investments (e.g., WeWork, Uber)
Regulatory scrutiny impacting strategic transactions (e.g., ARM-NVIDIA deal)
Dependence on high-risk, high-growth technology startups
controversies: WeWork debacle leading to significant financial losses and reputational damage
Legal settlements with WeWork and Adam Neumann over breach of contract and fiduciary duties
social_issues: Reputational damage from WeWork controversy and legal battles
governance_issues: Questions about due diligence and governance practices following the WeWork controversy
